properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') AS CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE ', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ' = ', item().CALMONTH)

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_NEIS.NEIS_MEALS_NEW
 WHERE YYYYMM = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1), 'MM'),'YYYYMM')

SELECT *
  FROM CD_NEIS.NEIS_MEALS_NEW
 WHERE YYYYMM = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMM')

SELECT c.* FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
, CD_NEIS.ORDER_DETAIL c
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND b.bidid = c.bidid
AND b.BID_DETAIL_ID = c.BID_DETAIL_ID
AND a.orgtype = 'A'
AND TRUNC(c.IF_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

preCopyScript.value:
truncate table cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail_temp;

select 1 as ss;

query.value:
INSERT INTO cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail
(
 order_detail_id          
  ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
)
SELECT order_detail_id          
    ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
FROM cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail_TEMP
WHERE bidid NOT IN ( SELECT distinct bidid from cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail );

select 1 as ss;

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  
REPLACE(c.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, CHR(0), '') AS ORDER_DETAIL_ID
,REPLACE(c.BID_DETAIL_ID, CHR(0), '') AS BID_DETAIL_ID
,REPLACE(c.BIDID, CHR(0), '') AS BIDID
,REPLACE(c.DOCID, CHR(0), '') AS DOCID
,REPLACE(c.ORGNAME, CHR(0), '') AS ORGNAME
,REPLACE(c.SHEET, CHR(0), '') AS SHEET
,REPLACE(c.NAME, CHR(0), '') AS NAME
,REPLACE(c.SPEC, CHR(0), '') AS SPEC
,REPLACE(c.UNIT, CHR(0), '') AS UNIT
,REPLACE(c.TEMP_CNT, CHR(0), '') AS TEMP_CNT
,REPLACE(c.COMP_DIV, CHR(0), '') AS COMP_DIV
,REPLACE(c.PROD_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PROD_CD
,REPLACE(c.STANDARD, CHR(0), '') AS STANDARD
,REPLACE(c.WORK_DT, CHR(0), '') AS WORK_DT
,REPLACE(c.MAPPING_CD, CHR(0), '') AS MAPPING_CD
,REPLACE(c.PRODUCTLEVEL_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PRODUCTLEVEL_CD
,REPLACE(c.PRICE_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PRICE_CD
,REPLACE(c.CNT, CHR(0), '') AS CNT
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_ID, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_ID
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_DT, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_DT
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_FLAG, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_FLAG
,REPLACE(c.SYSTEM_PROD_CH_YN, CHR(0), '') AS SYSTEM_PROD_CH_YN
,REPLACE(c.IF_DATE, CHR(0), '') AS IF_DATE
FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
, CD_NEIS.ORDER_DETAIL c
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND b.BID_DETAIL_ID = c.BID_DETAIL_ID
AND a.orgtype = 'S'
AND TRUNC(c.IF_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

properties.description: - 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O00000_FULL
 WHERE CALMONTH = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMM')

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o00000_full 
where calday between to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' - interval '1 months'), 'YYYYMMDD')
                 and  to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' - interval '0 months') - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD');

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O00000_FULL
 WHERE CALMONTH = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMM')

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o00000_full 
where calday  between to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' ), 'YYYYMMDD')
                  and to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' + interval '1 months') - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD');

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성(Copy Activity Sink에서 precopy script로 적용)

- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Current Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O00000_FULL
 WHERE CALMONTH BETWEEN '201907' AND '201912'
@concat('SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),''MM''),''YYYYMMDD'') AS SDATE, TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),''YYYYMMDD'')   AS EDATE FROM DUAL ')
@concat('SELECT CALDAY, MATERIAL, ZAMT, ZBOX FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,' WHERE CALDAY BETWEEN ''',item().SDATE,''' AND ''', item().EDATE,'''')

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('DELETE FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,' WHERE CALDAY BETWEEN ''', item().SDATE, ''' AND ''',item().EDATE,'''')}
